title: The LoL community and CoD community
body:
These two communities combined are sure to make a fun game for everyone, I look forward to the day all players from both communities join forces , the game they flock to is guaranteed to be the most easy going peaceful game.

Let's see why!
1. No neglected children who are high on crack playing early game champs like lee sin and saying 420 blaze yolo swag broken op freelo
2. Absolutely no rage
3. Everyone sweet talks each other
4. Everyone is respectful even off chat/mic,  *real world*
5. No real life screaming and passing out

replies.body: 420 blaze yolo swag broken op freelo
